category: THIS IS YOUR LIFE, JOHN QUINCY ADAMS

search_results.snippet: John Quincy Adams ( i/kwnzi/; [a] July 11, 1767  February 23, 1848) was an American statesman who served as the sixth President of the United States from 1825 to 1829. He also served as a diplomat, a Senator and member of the House of Representatives.
